      • ForeignKeyPicker

        public ForeignKeyPicker(BBjWindow wnd!,
BBjNumber id,
BBjControl ctrl!,
BusinessComponent bc!,
BBjString fk$)
        Constructor ForeignKeyPicker Creates the component by using a given existing BBjWindow
        Parameters:
        BBjWindow - wnd!: child window that the component shall occupy
        BBjNumber - id: Control ID for the BBjChildWindow, which is created on wnd!
        BBjControl - ctrl!: the control used to display the data
        BusinessComponent - bc!: the BusinessComponent which handles the data
        BBjString - fk$: the field name
